A

When a button or checkbox is acted upon, this method is called.

Black tiles

For the Blue BG Areas

Board UI pane

C

chatInputPanel - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
Chat input Pane
commandBtnSize - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
Dimension for the command buttons (up, down, left, right, move)
commands - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
commands UI Pane
Controller() - Constructor for class othello.OthelloViewController.Controller
 
createBoard() - Method in class othello.OthelloViewController
createBoard creates all elements of the Board pane, which is on the left side of the UI.
createChatInputArea(OthelloViewController.Controller) - Method in class othello.OthelloViewController
createChatInputArea creates the text field and submit button and adds them to the chat Panel
createCommands(OthelloViewController.Controller) - Method in class othello.OthelloViewController
createCommands creates all the elements on the right-hand side of the program.
createGUI() - Method in class othello.OthelloViewController
createGUI calls the methods to create each section of the UI, then adds them to the pane.

move - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
 

O

othello - package othello
 
Othello - Class in othello
Othello is the driver class for the program.
Othello() - Constructor for class othello.Othello
 
OthelloSplashScreen - Class in othello
OthelloSplashScreen contains all the code required to display the splash screen for the Othello program
OthelloSplashScreen(int) - Constructor for class othello.OthelloSplashScreen
Constructor for OthelloSplashScreen.
OthelloViewController - Class in othello
OthelloViewController contains all the code for creating the UI elements and adding them to the program's Frame.
OthelloViewController() - Constructor for class othello.OthelloViewController
OthelloViewController constructor creates the View Controller
OthelloViewController.Controller - Class in othello
Controller implements ActionListener and handles the action events from the buttons created by OthelloViewController

P

pane - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
Main UI Pane to which all UI elements will be appended

Player 1 Icon
player2Icon - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
Player 2 Icon

R

right - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController

Right Arrow Icon
ROWS - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController

S

serialVersionUID - Static variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
Serial version UID generated from serialver
showSplashWindow() - Method in class othello.OthelloSplashScreen
showSplashWindow creates and displays the splash screen, then uses invokeLater to launch the View Controller
showValidMoves - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
 
squares - Variable in class othello.OthelloViewController
2-dimensional array for the board squares
